channel.title: (UPDATED) Rune-Venom V2 - 718 - fully working NEX - NEED STAFF
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/6348/logohpc.png[/img]
SERVER FEATURES: Matrix 718 Loading 742 Fully working Fight Caves (All 63 waves) Fully working Fight Kiln Full Nex and Nomad with cut-scenes Unique custom made home Fully automated DoubleXP Weekends Great Economy Full Squeal of Fortune! Rewritten price loading using Enum All pets working Full summoning (except scrolls) Most skills fully working Easy to modify client using a Settings.java Crucible also fully working! All GodWars bosses! Full QBD and KBD No lag or memory leaks. No dupes. Even Grand Exchange! (has to be re-enabled) All Aura's Working with Wings and stuff
[IMG]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/1370/94128200.png[/img] Loading Screen
[IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/6524/28243342.png[/img] Log In Screen
[IMG]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/1953/73789155.png[/img] Welcome Message
[IMG]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/3153/26901664.png[/img] Assassin Mini-Game Wroking 100%
[IMG]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/8946/73727081.png[/img] Home
[IMG]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/1861/56899266.png[/img] Custom Time Zone And Teleports
[IMG]http://img541.imageshack.us/img541/5349/26344869.png[/img] Woring NEX
[IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/4791/45472552.png[/img] Fully Working Fight Caves
[size=18pt]NOTE: WHEN YOU RUN CLIENT, YOU HAVE TO WAIT AND NOT CLICK ANYTHING WHILE THE CACHE DOWNLOADS, OR IT WILL TAKE LIKE 3 HOURS. ALSO IF YOU ARE LAGGING BAD ON THE LOG-IN SCREEN, SET THE GRAPHIC SETTINGS TO CUSTOM BY CLICKING THE WRENCH IN THE UPPER RIGHT HAND CORNER, AND SET YOUR DISPLAY MODE TO OPEN GL R AS SHOWN BELOW ! [/size]
[IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/196/20130225204110runevenom.png[/img]
Download Link:[url=http://uppit.com/ctleik7n968o/RuneVenomClient.rar]Click Here[/url] Site and Forums: [url=http://www.runevenom2.weebly.com/]Click Here[/url]
Sorry for the lack of pictures, i am really tired, and will add more tomorrow so be waiting for the updated version :) ! [/center]
